p: Electrochemical measurements were performed with a VSP potentiostat (BioLogic Science Instruments, Seyssinet-Pariset, France) at room temperature under an inert atmosphere of argon. A customized single compartment three-electrode electrochemical cell was equipped with a glassy carbon plate as the counter electrode and a non-aqueous Ag/Ag + reference electrode (MW‒1085, BASi) filled with a 0.005 mol L −1 AgNO 3 solution in 0.1 M Et 4NBF 4/CH 3CN (its potential was −0.3 V vs. an Ag/AgCl/sat’d NaCl).
